__e: Are you sure I didn't slip out long enough to have killed him?

His job puts Chris at further risk, so he came to us sub-rosa instead to protect him.
You got him out of the way without appearing to, and you've placed me in the position in which you wish to see me.
Well, it got trashed on your watch so you've got some explaining to do.
I thought I would just sneak in and make my boy a little breakfast.
